text: El aguacero (Spanish: "rain") may refer to: *"El aguacero", tango by Cátulo Castillo *"El aguacero", song by Colombian singer , written Alejandro Gómez Cáceres, silver prize at Viña del Mar International Song Festival 1999 *"El aguacero", song by Juan Luis Guerra best video at Premio Lo Nuestro 1999
title: El aguacero
